sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import {Button} from '../ButtonElements'; import{ InfoContainer, InfoWrapper, InfoRow, Column1, TextWrapper, TopLine, Heading, Subtitle, BtnWrap, Column2, ImgWrap, Img } from './InfoElements'; const InfoSection = ( { id, lightBg, imgStart, topLine, lightText, headLine, darkText, description, buttonLabel, img, alt } ) => { return ( <> {topLine} {headLine} {description} ) } export default InfoSection
